title: The War Chariots of Britannia #Shorts #History #Units
description:
What were the War Chariots of Britannia like? (Full video coming soon)

When the Julius Caesar invaded Britannia, he was met by a relic of the homeric past, war chariots! These left quite the impression on the Romans who admired them as a unique unit which could combine the mobility of cavalry with the staying power of infantry.  In our full episode we cover the origins, equipment, training, and service history of these fascinating units.

You can learn more about the Units of History through our documentary series:

THE AFRICANS
Nubian Archers : https://youtu.be/qvO3_kYRRw8
The Sacred Band of Carthage : https://youtu.be/oX3y1GYcCEY
Carthaginian War Elephants : https://youtu.be/hDSRHGFCWEo
The Numidian Cavalry : https://youtu.be/3tv7EbkrX38

THE NEAR EAST

THE BYZANTINES
